ISSUE.TITLE: [docs] missing env variables
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: First, I'm loving gitness and would like to thank all for your work. There are a lot of possible configuration via ENV vars defined in [types/config.go](https://github.com/harness/gitness/blob/main/types/config.go) but most are not [documented](https://docs.gitness.com/installation/settings) at all. Would be great if all are listed and documented accordingly or if you accept PR for documentation Thanks
